Interface ServerStub

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Server

    public interface ServerStub
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The interface for ServerStub so the LogIn can view all of the active games and get all of the ports so the correct GameServer can be connected to.
